value:
Eirika and I are both childhood friends
and comrades in battle. She has my
trust, and I hers.

Innes will carry Frelia into the future.
I must grow into someone who can
support him in that task.

I am inexperienced with the bow,
but tell me—do you think that I
can master it with practice?

Syrene is like a big sister to me. Her
skill as a knight and her kindness
set wonderful examples.

I've made changes to my garb. I hope
to show it off to Eirika soon. I think
she'll have nice things to say!

I am Tana, princess of Frelia. I carry
a vow of unceasing friendship from
$Nf.

Watch me, Innes. I will open a path
to the future, grasping the bow you
have entrusted me.

I must bring this battle to a quick end.
I cannot allow any more lives to be
sacrificed.

Another miss! Archery is challenging
indeed.
How pleasing. I will work even harder.

I am Tana, princess of Frelia. As
long as I have this bow my brother
entrusted to me, I will never lose.

Born a princess, I lived knowing little
of the world...$k$pI learned, in time, that I had become
accustomed to the luxuries of my
sheltered world.$k$pI left it to go to battle—for Magvel.
Once I saw the suffering of the
people, I realized it could not stand.$k$pI fight for the people of Askr because
I wish to shield them, too, from the
flames of war. It is my duty as royalty.$k$pEven I, who knew nothing of the
world, could change it. I am certain
anyone can grow, with determination.$k$pI will continue to study, to learn what
it is that I can do—all that is in my
power to do, given my position.
My victory is assured!
A clear, piercing shot!
Don't dare underestimate me!
Just do as Innes does.
So careless...
My brother is quite the bowman. Now that he's given me this bow, I hope that I can become as skilled!
*gasp* Why, you! This bow is a treasure. You almost made me drop it!
Like this? Hmm, no. That's not right. *sigh* Maybe I should ask Innes for help after all...
Archers make short work of pegasus knights. It pays to know your foe!
I want to stand shoulder to shoulder with Innes on the battlefield, as Eirika does with Ephraim.
Attired like this, I feel more confident on the battlefield. What do you think? Does it suit me?
Now that I can wield a bow, I can do even more for you. How wonderful!
Right you are!
Suggestions?
Leave it to me!
